usb.interface_tips: USB settings apply only to the data port and do not affect the power-only port.
usb.ask_me_tips: Prompt each time (don't force a role)
usb.usb_host_tips: Acts as USB Host (accepts compatible USB Peripherals)
usb.usb_tethering_tips: Acts as USB Tether Device (presents as a USB network adapter to a host)
usb.power_threshold_tips: Minimum battery threshold for external power output (USB devices will be unavailable below this level)

power.auto_system_standby_tips: When enabled, if networks are idle and no USB is connected and Repeater is not in use, the system will automatically enter standby.
